task_1_output: Hello? Hi, Nancy. This is Mike from at and T, Inc. Yes, how can I help you? Nancy, you have been using our prepaid connection for a couple of years now, right? Yeah, that's right. How would you like a postpaid connection that allows you to make free, unlimited voice calls to three at and T numbers? I would love that, but what's the catch? There's no catch. There will be a monthly rental which you will have to pay like any other postpaid connection. Fantastic. Sign me up.
